Cakes & Flavors

We offer a wide range of classic and specialty cake flavors. All cakes are made in our nut-free facility. If you have dietary needs (gluten-free, dairy-free, sugar-free) please contact us to confirm availability for specific designs.

Traditional Flavors

Gluten, Dairy, Egg, and Sugar Free Options Available

  • White
  • Yellow
  • Chocolate
  • Red Velvet
  • Strawberry
  • Lemon
  • Lime
  • Raspberry
  • Marble (swirl of two flavors)
  • Mocha
  • Coffee
  • Cinnamon

Can't find what you want? We often create custom flavors — ask when placing your order.

Can't find what you want? We often create custom flavors — ask when placing your order.

Frosting

Dairy, Egg, and Sugar Free Options Available

*Additional fees may apply

Classic Frostings

  • American Buttercream
  • Italian Buttercream
  • Sugar Free Buttercream (made with monk fruit)
  • Cream Cheese

Specialty Frostings

  • Ganache (White, Milk, or Dark)
  • Whipped Cream
  • Fondant

We tint and flavor frostings to match your design — final color may differ slightly.

Frosting Flavor Additions

Add any of these flavors to your frosting for an additional kick of flavor.

Decadent

  • Chocolate
  • Salted Caramel,
  • Maple
  • Bourbon

Fruit & Citrus

  • Strawberry
  • Raspberry
  • Blackberry
  • Lemon
  • Lime
  • Orange

Spices & Essences

  • Cinnamon
  • Ginger
  • Lavender
  • Rosewater
  • Peppermint

These are just a few of our options. Contacts us if you have something else in mind.

The possibilities are endless!

Fillings

*Additional fees may apply

  • Strawberry
  • Raspberry
  • Blackberry
  • Peach
  • Cherry
  • Other
  • Chocolate Ganache
  • White Chocolate Ganache
  • Caramel
  • Chocolate Mousse
  • Vanilla Mousse

Fresh fruit is also available depending on the season, but it is not recommended for outdoor parties during the summer months.

Signature Gourmet Cakes — Sara's Specialties

These are our specialty designs and flavor combinations — perfect for celebrations where you want something unique and memorable.

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough

Brown sugar cake filled with egg-less chocolate chip cookie dough. Frosted with salted vanilla buttercream or chocolate ganache.

May I Have S'more

Graham cracker cake filled with chocolate ganache. Frosted with toasted marshmallow frosting and topped with ganache drip.

Triple Berry Lemon

Light and fluffy lemon cake with whole blueberries. Filled with a layer of strawberry, and a layer of raspberry Italian buttercream. Frosted in lemon Italian buttercream.

Ube Dream

This boba tea inspired cake is made with real ube! It is an ube sponge filled with vanilla mousse and frosted in an ube and mascarpone buttercream. It's naturally purple!

Chocolate Chai

Our delicious chocolate cake mixed with real black tea, cardamom, cinnamon, ginger, and black pepper. Filled and frosted in Chai tea Italian buttercream. Topped with chocolate ganache drip.

Chocolate Bourbon

Contains alcohol, for adults only Super moist chocolate cake infused with real bourbon whiskey. Filled with chocolate ganache. Topped with chocolate bourbon buttercream.

Other Specialties

Blackberry Peach

Vanilla cake filled with a house made peach preserve. Frosted with blackberry buttercream and topped with a fresh blackberry (subject to seasonal availability).

Honey Ginger

Delicious honey cake infused with ginger. Filled with a Greek yogurt honey mousse and frosted in a whipped white chocolate ganache. Bump it up with an extra splash of orange zest for an addition burst of flavor (optional).

Maple Bacon

Vanilla cake with real bacon crumbles inside. Filled and frosted with maple Italian buttercream and topped with real crispy bacon strips.

Cherry Lime

Lime flavored cake with cherry filling. Topped with cherry lime buttercream and a maraschino cherries.

Margarita

Contains alcohol, for adults only. Lime flavored cake infused with real tequila. Frosted with tequila lime buttercream and sprinkled with salt.

Black Forest

Contains alcohol, for adults only. Thin layers of chocolate cake infused with cherry Kirsch. Alternately layered with cherry filling and whipped cream. Frosted in whipped cream and topped with maraschino cherries and chocolate shavings.

Lucky Clover

Contains alcohol, for adults only. Green Velvet cake layered with rich mint chocolate ganache filling. Frosted with Bailey's Irish Cream frosting.

Want a custom version of a signature cake? Contact us to discuss flavors, dietary needs, and custom decor.
